attributes.action: reinstate the public interest element into takeover law.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am not against take overs as such but the French and German markets are far more protected than the UK and US markets. It is far harder for a UK company to take over a French or German company  than a UK company to take over a US company. I am just asking for an equal playing field.
